name: handbrake-web
description: Handbrake-Web is a web-based UI for the HandBrake video transcoder, allowing users to queue conversions, set presets, and manage encoding jobs without the desktop GUI.
features: Web Interface: Browser-based control, No desktop app needed, Remote access. Transcode from anywhere.
Queue Management: Batch processing, Priority ordering, Progress tracking. Handle multiple files.
Presets: Built-in profiles, Custom settings, Device optimization. Perfect output every time.
Format Support: MP4, MKV, WebM, Multiple codecs. Convert anything.
Quality Control: Bitrate settings, Resolution options, Compression levels. Fine-tune output.
Hardware Acceleration: GPU encoding, Faster processing, Efficient transcoding. Save time.
Monitoring: Real-time progress, ETA display, Resource usage. Stay informed.
Scheduling: Automated jobs, Folder watching, Batch operations. Set and forget.
